Name: Core Passive: Hyperfocus
Additional Ability: Cleanup Assistance
Descriptions: After holding or tapping repeatedly, when Corin unleashes a continuous extended slash with her Chainsaw, the skill's DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>18.7%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
Corin deals 35% more DMG to Stunned enemies.
After holding or tapping repeatedly, when Corin unleashes a continuous extended slash with her Chainsaw, the skill's DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>21.8%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
Corin deals 35% more DMG to Stunned enemies.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
Corin deals 35% more DMG to Stunned enemies.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
Corin deals 35% more DMG to Stunned enemies.
After holding or tapping repeatedly, when Corin unleashes a continuous extended slash with her Chainsaw, the skill's DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>31.2%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
Corin deals 35% more DMG to Stunned enemies.
After holding or tapping repeatedly, when Corin unleashes a continuous extended slash with her Chainsaw, the skill's DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>34.3%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
Corin deals 35% more DMG to Stunned enemies.
After holding or tapping repeatedly, when Corin unleashes a continuous extended slash with her Chainsaw, the skill's DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>37.5%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
Corin deals 35% more DMG to Stunned enemies.

Cons.Name: Open Trauma
Cons.Effect: When Corin's <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> hits an enemy, her DMG against the target increases by 12% for 15s.

Cons.Name: Atomic Smash
Cons.Effect: When Corin's <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> hits an enemy, the target's <color=#F0D12B>Physical RES</color> is reduced by 0.5%, stacking up to 20 times and lasting 5s. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.

Cons.Name: Battlefield Retainer
Cons.Effect: When Corin uses a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, she recovers 7.2 Energy. This effect can trigger once every 16s.

Cons.Name: Accumulated Release
Cons.Effect:
When Corin's extended slash hits an enemy, she obtains a stack of Charge (max 40 stacks).
During a <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up</color>, when her chainsaw detonation hits an enemy, consumes all stacks of Charge. Each stack consumed causes the attack to deal an additional 3% of ATK as DMG.
